definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: By recognizing the changing characteristics of your cervical mucus, you can predict when you'll ovulate.
sentences.chinese: 通過認識到宮頸粘液性狀的改變，可以預測排卵時間。

sentences.english: A quantitative analysis of the variation pattern of characters of the Viola variegata complex.
sentences.chinese: 斑葉堇菜種宗性狀變異式樣的定量分析。

sentences.english: Correlation and path analysis for 16 traits of Kosteletzkya virginica was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對海濱錦葵的16個數量性狀進行了相關和通徑分析。

sentences.english: Field tests of influences of working load on negative skin friction behaviors were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 進行了樁頂荷載對於負摩阻力性狀影響的現場試驗。

sentences.english: Jinhui12 is an excellent parental candidate in improving the characteristic of neck-panicle vascular bundles.
sentences.chinese: 縉恢12號是改良穗頸維管束性狀的優良親本。

sentences.english: Dwarf is one of the major target traits in soybean breeding.
sentences.chinese: 矮稈是大豆育種的重要目標性狀之一。

sentences.english: Bigger correlation coefficients can be obtained by the broad heritability method.
sentences.chinese: 按廣義遺傳力法選用研究性狀則相關係數大。

sentences.english: Preliminary inheritance results show that only one pair of recessive nuclear genes control the Pmw trait.
sentences.chinese: 經初步遺傳分析，該乳白花性狀由單隱性核基因控制。

sentences.english: The experimental procedure of the genetic analysis for endosperm qualitative-quantitative characters is presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中給出了進行此類性狀遺傳分析的實驗程序。

sentences.english: During the experiment, there were significant changes in each cell. Inoculated sludge was black.
sentences.chinese: 試驗過程中，各隔室污泥性狀發生了明顯的改變。

sentences.english: The bearing capacity behavoir of foundation is studied from different ang…
sentences.chinese: 即從不同角度探討了複合地基的承力性狀。

sentences.english: Rats of the traits that depend on the source of the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 說明仔鼠的性狀取決於細胞核的來源。

sentences.english: Leaf inner-rolling is one of the most morphological characters in plant breeding at present.
sentences.chinese: 水稻正卷葉性狀是目前株型育種的目標之一。

sentences.english: The order of variation coefficient of phenotypic were leaf, body size, flower and fruit.
sentences.chinese: 各性狀變異係數的大小次序爲葉＞樹體＞花＞果。

sentences.english: Preliminary research indicates that genetic engineering approaches could be employed to enhance both these traits.
sentences.chinese: 初步研究表明基因工程的方法可用來增加這兩中性狀。

sentences.english: The two traits of the male sterility and brown paddy hull are inherited independently.
sentences.chinese: 雄性不育性與褐色穎殼兩個性狀屬獨立遺傳。

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
